channel.title: Iliana Medina on Luke Holman
channel.description: Recent content in Iliana Medina on Luke Holman

item.title: Male‐biased sexual selection, but not sexual dichromatism, predicts speciation in birds
item.description: We test whether variation in sexual selection can predict speciation and extinction rates across up to 5,812 species of passerine birds. Male‐biased sexual selection, and specifically sexual size dimorphism, predicted two of the three measures of speciation rates that we examined.
